definition.de: Einrichtungen, die von Einzelnen besucht werden, aufgrund gemeinsamer Interessen.
definition.dk: Organisation med medlemmer, der deler en interesse.
definition.en-GB: Organisations joined by individuals because of similar interests
definition.en-US: organizations joined by individuals because of similar interests
definition.pt-BR: Organizações a que as pessoas aderem por partilharem interesses similares.
definition.pt-PT: Organizações a que as pessoas aderem por partilharem interesses similares.
definition.se: Organisationer med medlemmar som delar ett intresse.
definition.zh-Hans: 个人出于类似兴趣而加入的组织
